verses.text: \w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w entered|strong="G1525"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w synagogue|strong="G4864"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* there \w was|strong="G2258"\w* a \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w there|strong="G1563"\w* which \w had|strong="G2192"\w* a \w withered|strong="G3583"\w* \w hand|strong="G5495"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w watched|strong="G3906"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w whether|strong="G1487"\w* he would \w heal|strong="G2323"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* on the sabbath \w day|strong="G4521"\w*; \w that|strong="G2443"\w* they might \w accuse|strong="G2723"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto the \w man|strong="G1519"\w* which \w had|strong="G2192"\w* the \w withered|strong="G3583"\w* \w hand|strong="G5495"\w*, \wj  \+w Stand|strong="G1453"\+w* \+w forth|strong="G3319"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Is it lawful|strong="G1832"\+w* \+w to do good|strong="G0015"\+w* \+w on the sabbath days|strong="G4521"\+w*, \+w or|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w to do evil|strong="G2554"\+w*? \+w to save|strong="G4982"\+w* \+w life|strong="G5590"\+w*, \+w or|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w to kill|strong="G0615"\+w*?\wj* \w But|strong="G1161"\w* they held their \w peace|strong="G4623"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* when he had looked round \w about|strong="G4017"\w* on \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w anger|strong="G3709"\w*, being \w grieved|strong="G4818"\w* \w for|strong="G1909"\w* the \w hardness|strong="G4457"\w* \w of|strong="G2588"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w*, he \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto the \w man|strong="G0444"\w*, \wj  \+w Stretch forth|strong="G1614"\+w* \+w thine|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w hand|strong="G5495"\+w*.\wj* \w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w stretched|strong="G1614"\w* \add it\add* \w out|strong="G1614"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w hand|strong="G5495"\w* was \w restored|strong="G0600"\w* \w whole|strong="G5199"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* the \w other|strong="G0243"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w* went \w forth|strong="G1831"\w*, and \w straightway|strong="G2112"\w* \w took|strong="G4160"\w* \w counsel|strong="G4824"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* the \w Herodians|strong="G2265"\w* \w against|strong="G2596"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w how|strong="G3704"\w* they might \w destroy|strong="G0622"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w But|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* withdrew \w himself|strong="G0402"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* the \w sea|strong="G2281"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* a \w great|strong="G4183"\w* \w multitude|strong="G4128"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w* \w followed|strong="G0190"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Judæa|strong="G2449"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Idumaea|strong="G2401"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add from\add* \w beyond|strong="G4008"\w* \w Jordan|strong="G2446"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G3588"\w* \w about|strong="G4012"\w* \w Tyre|strong="G5184"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Sidon|strong="G4605"\w*, a \w great|strong="G4183"\w* \w multitude|strong="G4128"\w*, when they had \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* what great \w things|strong="G3745"\w* he \w did|strong="G4160"\w*, \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w spake|strong="G2036"\w* \w to|strong="G3101"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* a small \w ship|strong="G4142"\w* should \w wait|strong="G4342"\w* on \w him|strong="G0846"\w* because \w of|strong="G1223"\w* the \w multitude|strong="G3793"\w*, \w lest|strong="G2443"\w* they should \w throng|strong="G2346"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* he had \w healed|strong="G2323"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w*; insomuch \w that|strong="G5620"\w* they pressed \w upon|strong="G1968"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* for \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w touch|strong="G0680"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, as many \w as|strong="G3745"\w* \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w plagues|strong="G3148"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w unclean|strong="G0169"\w* \w spirits|strong="G4151"\w*, \w when|strong="G3752"\w* they \w saw|strong="G2334"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, fell down \w before|strong="G4363"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w cried|strong="G2896"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Thou|strong="G4771"\w* \w art|strong="G1488"\w* the \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2008"\w* \w straitly|strong="G4183"\w* \w charged|strong="G2008"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* they \w should|strong="G5318"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w make|strong="G4160"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w known|strong="G5318"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he goeth \w up|strong="G0305"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* a \w mountain|strong="G3735"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w calleth|strong="G4341"\w* \add unto him\add* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w would|strong="G2309"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w came|strong="G0565"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w ordained|strong="G4160"\w* \w twelve|strong="G1427"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* they should \w be|strong="G5600"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* he might \w send|strong="G0649"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w forth|strong="G0649"\w* to \w preach|strong="G2784"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* to \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w power|strong="G1849"\w* to \w heal|strong="G2323"\w* \w sicknesses|strong="G3554"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to cast \w out|strong="G1544"\w* \w devils|strong="G1140"\w*:
\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Simon|strong="G4613"\w* \w he|strong="G2007"\w* \w surnamed|strong="G4074"\w* Peter;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w James|strong="G2385"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \add son\add* of \w Zebedee|strong="G2199"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w* the \w brother|strong="G0080"\w* of \w James|strong="G2385"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2007"\w* \w surnamed|strong="G3686"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w Boanerges|strong="G0993"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w*, The \w sons|strong="G5207"\w* of \w thunder|strong="G1027"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Andrew|strong="G0406"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Philip|strong="G5376"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Bartholomew|strong="G0918"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Matthew|strong="G3156"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Thomas|strong="G2381"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w James|strong="G2385"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \add son\add* of \w Alphaeus|strong="G0256"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Thaddaeus|strong="G2280"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Simon|strong="G4613"\w* the \w Canaanite|strong="G2581"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Judas|strong="G2455"\w* \w Iscariot|strong="G2469"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w betrayed|strong="G3860"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w went|strong="G2064"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* an \w house|strong="G3624"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w multitude|strong="G3793"\w* cometh \w together|strong="G4905"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w*, so \w that|strong="G5620"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w could|strong="G1410"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* so much \w as|strong="G3383"\w* \w eat|strong="G5315"\w* \w bread|strong="G0740"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G0191"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w friends|strong="G3844"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \add of it\add*, they went \w out|strong="G1831"\w* to lay \w hold|strong="G2902"\w* on \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* they \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, He is beside \w himself|strong="G1839"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w scribes|strong="G1122"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* came \w down|strong="G2597"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, He \w hath|strong="G2192"\w* \w Beelzebub|strong="G0954"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* the \w prince|strong="G0758"\w* of the \w devils|strong="G1140"\w* casteth he \w out|strong="G1544"\w* \w devils|strong="G1140"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w called|strong="G4341"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \add unto him\add*, and \w said|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w parables|strong="G3850"\w*, \wj  \+w How|strong="G4459"\+w* \+w can|strong="G1410"\+w* \+w Satan|strong="G4567"\+w* \+w cast out|strong="G1544"\+w* \+w Satan|strong="G4567"\+w*?\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w if|strong="G1437"\+w* \+w a kingdom|strong="G0932"\+w* \+w be divided|strong="G3307"\+w* \+w against|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w itself|strong="G1438"\+w*, \+w that|strong="G1565"\+w* \+w kingdom|strong="G0932"\+w* \+w cannot|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w stand|strong="G2476"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w if|strong="G1437"\+w* \+w a house|strong="G3614"\+w* \+w be divided|strong="G3307"\+w* \+w against|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w itself|strong="G1438"\+w*, \+w that|strong="G1565"\+w* \+w house|strong="G3614"\+w* \+w cannot|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w stand|strong="G2476"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w if|strong="G1487"\+w* \+w Satan|strong="G4567"\+w* \+w rise up|strong="G0450"\+w* \+w against|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w himself|strong="G1438"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w be divided|strong="G3307"\+w*, \+w he|strong="G1410"\+w* \+w cannot|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w stand|strong="G2476"\+w*, \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w hath|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w an end|strong="G5056"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w No|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w man|strong="G3762"\+w* \+w can|strong="G1410"\+w* \+w enter|strong="G1525"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w a strong man’s|strong="G2478"\+w* \+w house|strong="G3614"\+w*, \+w and spoil|strong="G1283"\+w* \+w his|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w goods|strong="G4632"\+w*, \+w except|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w he will|strong="G1210"\+w* \+w first|strong="G4412"\+w* \+w bind|strong="G1210"\+w* \+w the strong man|strong="G2478"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w then|strong="G5119"\+w* \+w he will spoil|strong="G1283"\+w* \+w his|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w house|strong="G3614"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w Verily|strong="G0281"\+w* \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w All|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w sins|strong="G0265"\+w* \+w shall be forgiven|strong="G0863"\+w* \+w unto the sons|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w of men|strong="G0444"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w blasphemies|strong="G0988"\+w* \+w wherewith|strong="G3745"\+w* \+w soever|strong="G0302"\+w* \+w they shall blaspheme|strong="G0987"\+w*:\wj*

\wj  \+w But|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w he|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w that|strong="G0302"\+w* \+w shall blaspheme|strong="G0987"\+w* \+w against|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the Holy|strong="G0040"\+w* \+w Ghost|strong="G4151"\+w* \+w hath|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w never|strong="G0165"\+w* \+w forgiveness|strong="G0859"\+w*, \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w in danger|strong="G1777"\+w* \+w of eternal|strong="G0166"\+w* \+w damnation|strong="G2920"\+w*:\wj*
\w Because|strong="G3754"\w* they \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, He \w hath|strong="G2192"\w* an \w unclean|strong="G0169"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*.

¶ There \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w mother|strong="G3384"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w*, \w standing|strong="G2476"\w* \w without|strong="G1854"\w*, \w sent|strong="G0649"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w calling|strong="G5455"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w multitude|strong="G3793"\w* \w sat|strong="G2521"\w* \w about|strong="G4012"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* they \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Behold|strong="G2400"\w*, \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w mother|strong="G3384"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w* \w without|strong="G1854"\w* \w seek|strong="G2212"\w* for \w thee|strong="G4571"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \wj  \+w Who|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w mother|strong="G3384"\+w*, \+w or|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w brethren|strong="G0080"\+w*?\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w looked|strong="G4017"\w* round \w about|strong="G2945"\w* on them which \w sat|strong="G2521"\w* \w about|strong="G4012"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, and \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, \wj  \+w Behold|strong="G1492"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w mother|strong="G3384"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w brethren|strong="G0080"\+w*!\wj*

\wj  \+w For|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w whosoever|strong="G0302"\+w* \+w shall do|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w the will|strong="G2307"\+w* \+w of God|strong="G2316"\+w*, \+w the same|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w brother|strong="G0080"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w sister|strong="G0079"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w mother|strong="G3384"\+w*.\wj*
